title: Full circle: the work of Doris Chase
creator_credit: Perspective Films, Elizabeth Wood and Doris Chase
brief_description: Documentary on painter, sculptor and filmmaker, Doris Chase. Ms Chase explains her work including the development of her sculptural furnishings for modern dance groups into video film works.
